phases.name: Phase 0
phases.summary: Substrate: neutral membrane boundary physics only.

phases.name: Phase 1
phases.summary: Commercial core: internet-app spine (with membrane borders) hardened to shipping cliffs.

phases.name: Phase 2
phases.summary: Authority lane: proof receipts + federation hygiene and stricter verification posture.

phases.name: Phase 3
phases.summary: Enterprise reality (lite): compliance evidence cliffs without regulated avionics burden.

phases.name: Phase 4
phases.summary: Platform multiplier (lite): ML registry + drift + reproducibility linkage as enforceable physics.

phases.name: Phase 5
phases.summary: Truth machines (lite): distributed truth cliffs and partition behavior evidence.

phases.name: Phase 6
phases.summary: Phase 6: hard realms (lite). Adds hard real-time, game/simulation, and kernel/runtime physics packs.

phases.name: Phase 7
phases.summary: Privacy compute (lite): selective disclosure and proof-carrying claims as a distinct immiscible physics regime.

phases.name: Phase 8
phases.summary: Phase 8: identity/access (lite). Wallet login + session receipts + DID binding evidence + agent access receipts.
